timeline.message:
Make jest/expect-expect rule allow any function starting with expect

That way expect calls can be refactored into their own function if need be.
Fix interfaces with same name as the function

Allow eval in JQueryDiv and LegacyContent.tsx

These two areas are too big an important to remove the eval without a lot of work.

timeline.bodyText:
A couple questions
I'm not seeing a typescript ESLint rule that enforces an I prefix for interfaces.
https://github.com/typescript-eslint/typescript-eslint/tree/master/packages/eslint-plugin
How was this flagged by ESLint? 🤨
Also is this generally a pattern that will/should be adopted?
This is the only place I currently see it.

There was a couple places in which an interface and a default export function had the same identifier. Reworked by prepending 'I' to the interface definition.

It seems like these are the odd interfaces out, would it make sense to choose a different name, vs I prefixing?
timeline.author: ChristianMurphy

replies.bodyText:
Yes, I'd prefer to avoid this appending of I and go with more deliberate naming. So I've attempted to offer alternatives for the two places.
Here is an interesting one, as the interface seems rather redundant. It's not exported or used anywhere other then immediately below it which ultimately is really determining the structure. It seems like unnecessary double handling.
Option 1 then, is simply get rid of the interface.
But if we really really want to keep it then have the interface called Config and rename the object to AppConfig.
replies.author: edalex-ian

replies.bodyText: It didn't seem happy without an interface so I went with the Config and AppConfig approach.
replies.author: SammyIsConfused

timeline.author: ChristianMurphy

replies.bodyText: So based on what this is an how this is used, it would be better called LegacyPageContent. Other alternatives would be suffixing with Response - as it is one of the responses the Legacy API can return when submitting a form.
replies.author: edalex-ian

timeline.author: ChristianMurphy
